articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Construction Site of Mirae Scientists Street
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Construction Site of Mirae Scientists Street
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of  the Korean People's Army, guided the construction of the Mirae Scientists Street on the spot after enjoying a bird's-eye view of it from his plane.
					 He, to begin with, commanded a bird's-eye view of the construction site from his plane.
					
					 In the plane he said that it was very nice to see buildings under construction as required by the lay-out design of the street ratified by the party.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction, saying that the frames of the apartment houses and public buildings to be completed in the first phase have sprung up like mushrooms after rain thanks to the devoted struggle of soldier builders. The construction site of the street is reminiscent of those in the 1970s and the 1980s and Pyongyang spirit and speed today are being created there, he added.
					
					 Noting that the objects built in the first phase will look splendid when those in the second phase are constructed well, he fixed the construction projects in the second phase and their scope.
					
					 Looking down the magnificent appearance of Pyongyang City changing day by day from the plane, he said he came to have the conviction that if the construction makes progress at this speed, it is possible to successfully face-lift Pyongyang, the capital of the revolution, as a world class city to be envied by the world true to the behests of the great leaders in the near future.
					
					 Then he guided the construction of the street on the spot.
					
					 He said he was satisfied to look down the construction site from the plane. His face beaming with a broad smile, he added its appearance on the spot looks more magnificent and spectacular.
					
					 After being briefed on the construction before a plan showing the  bird's eye-view of the street, he went round flat No.1 on the second floor of block No. 77, geothermal water pumping station and various other places to learn in detail about the first phase construction.
					
					 Saying that the soldier builders are constructing the objects in the first phase of the street as required by the new century, he praised them for having built a new embankment along the bank of the River Taedong after removing the old one to make the street look splendid and successfully constructing the interior of the apartment houses.
					
					 Underscoring the need to turn the Mirae Scientists Street into the one fully demonstrating the party's policy of attaching importance to science and talents, he stressed that the officials of the relevant unit and soldier builders involved in the construction should complete the street as the one to be handed down to posterity from the stand to ensure the highest civilization and create the maximum speed.
					
					 He said that it is necessary to build all structures in such a manner as to preserve their own features and appearances and to be peculiar so as to symbolize the scientists street.
					
					 He gave instructions to produce furniture and fixtures for flats at the highest level while building the street and construct well medical care and commercial network and cultural facilities including barber's house, beauty salon, laundry, bath house, dress and shoes repairers, pharmacy, restaurant, shop and library.
					
					  He said that it is necessary to push forward the embankment arrangement of the River Taedong and the greening of the area around the street while stepping up the construction of structures as required by the design and construction method.
					
					  He told the commanding officers to give precedence to the frontline-style political work for giving fullest play to the mental power of the soldier builders, dynamically conduct a socialist competition, pay deep attention to the supply service for them and take care of them like their real parents would do so that they may not have any slightest inconvenience in their living.
					
					 Calling for unconditionally completing the first phase construction of the street till the Day of the Sun this year and the second phase construction till the 70th founding anniversary of the party, he stressed that to this end it is necessary to reinforce the construction force of the People's Army and the whole party, state and society should render positive support to the construction of the street.
					
					 Noting that the construction site of the street is the place which proves the validity of the WPK's construction policy and showcases the level of the Korean people's civilization and mental power of the army and people, he added that under the leadership of the party the recent period witnesses great changes in every site of the grand socialist construction as what is happening in the construction site of the Mirae Scientists Street.
					
					 He said that he came to have stronger confidence that the party's plan for building a rich and powerful nation is sure to come true thanks to such staunch and loyal soldiers while looking down from the plane and watching on the spot them waging a dynamic drive despite the mid winter cold weather.  
					
					 He extended the militant salute of the supreme commander to them.
					
					 He called on the soldier builders to steadily expand the successes being registered in all projects and carry out their assignments for objects and phases as scheduled and thus powerfully demonstrate once again the truth that the DPRK's determination precisely means practice through the construction of the street.
					
					  He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, and Han Kwang Sang, department director of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Greets Serbian PM
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Greets Serbian PM
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Sunday sent a message of greeting to Aleksandar Vucic, prime minister of the Republic of Serbia, on its national day. 
					 The message wished the prime minister and his government success in the work for national progress and people's wellbeing.
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a similar message to Ivica Dacic, first deputy prime minister and foreign minister on the same day.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks 73rd Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks 73rd Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium Sunday to celebrate the 73rd birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were senior party, state and army officials including Choe Ryong Hae and Hwang Pyong So, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, officers and men of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Korean Internal Security Forces, men of meritorious services, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, working people in Pyongyang, overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were representatives of diplomatic missions and international organizations and military attaches here.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, made a report.
					
					 The reporter said February 16 is the greatest auspicious day of the nation when the Korean people have come to always live under the blessings of the illustrious leaders and a revolutionary holiday common to mankind that opened up a bright road for the human cause of independence.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Il was born in Mt. Paektu, sacred mountain of the revolution, grew up in the flame of wars against Japan and the U.S., led the WPK and the army and people of the DPRK to victory for more than half a century since he embarked on the road of the revolution with the lofty intention to glorify Korea for all ages.
					
					 The reporter continued:
					
					 Kim Jong Il created the ever-victorious history of the revolutionary cause of Juche with firm faith and staunch attack spirit of Mt. Paektu, achieved miracles and changes in all fields of politics, military affairs, economy and culture and realized in his lifetime the great cause of demonstrating the dignity and might of the country all over the world.
					
					 He formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism, glorified it as the guiding idea in the era of independence, formulated and systematized the Songun idea and advanced the Songun revolutionary line and the Songun political theory.
					
					 He led the country to demonstrate its might as the world's greatest political and ideological power and pursued the benevolent politics and all-embracing politics with his outstanding political ability, thus creating the harmonious whole in which all service personnel and people share the same thought, intention and feelings with the leader, single-mindedly united around the leader, and remarkably strengthening the driving force of the Korean revolution.
					
					 During the grim days of trials Kim Jong Il held higher the banner of Songun and turned the DPRK into the world-class military power and dignified nuclear weapons state no one dares provoke. This is the unprecedented miracle in human history and the peculiar feat to be praised by generations to come.
					
					 He indicated a shortcut to the building of an economic power and provided valuable treasures and assets for the eternal prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people.
					
					 With his ardent patriotism he led all Koreans along the road of independent reunification and the great national unity, thus opening up the June 15 era of reunification based on By Our Nation Itself. With his superb diplomatic strategy and energetic external activities he made great contributions to raising the international prestige of the DPRK and defending the world peace and stability.
					
					 With his high responsibility for the future of the revolution he successfully solved the issue of succession to the leadership, thus performing the greatest feat that guarantees the eternal future of the country and the revolution.
					
					 As led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, another great man symbolic of the spirit of Mt. Paektu who is identical to the preceding leaders in thinking, leadership and virtues, the Korean revolution makes progress along the road of advance that started on Mt. Paektu and the army and people of the DPRK are dashing toward the high eminence of a thriving nation with conviction in certain victory.
					
					 The reporter called on the entire party and army and all the people to win victories in the general advance of defending socialism and building a thriving nation in hearty response to the New Year address made by Kim Jong Un, a resolution of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the joint slogans of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK and thus glorify the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and the WPK as a great revolutionary, auspicious events.
					
					 Similar meetings took place in provinces, cities, counties and industrial complexes on the same day.

articles.title: Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy in Phnom Penh
articles.content:
Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy in Phnom Penh
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- King Norodom Sihamoni and Great Queen Norodom Monineath Sihanouk of the Kingdom of Cambodia respectively sent large floral baskets to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh on Wednesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 The floral baskets were laid before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message from Communist Party of Russian Federation
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message from Communist Party of Russian Federation
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a congratulatory message from G.A. Zhuganov, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, on Thursday. 
					 The message said: 
					
					 Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un,
					
					 On the occasion of the 73rd birth anniversary of Comrade Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people, we, together with the Korean people, look back upon the exploits performed by him, a true son of the country.  
					
					 While leading the DPRK for decades Comrade Kim Jong Il performed great exploits in strengthening the sovereignty of the country and bolstering the national defence capabilities and building socialism. 
					
					 This year is a special year for the Workers' Party of Korea and the Communist Party of the Russian Federation.
					
					 We will mark the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the WPK and Korea's liberation together with you.
					
					 We hope that you and the Korean people will confidently advance along the road indicated by the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il in the future, too.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message from Koreans in China
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message from Koreans in China
 Beijing, February 14 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted by organizations of Koreans in China with due ceremony at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Feb. 14 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 Present there were Paek Kyong Hyon, chairman of the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China, and other Korean citizens. 
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un by the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China and its Beijing City Branch and the Zhongnan Regional Association of the Federation of Korean Young Nationals in China was adopted at the ceremony.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message from Japanese
articles.content:
Reception Given for Employees of Wonsan Shoes Factory
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Japanese horticulturist Mototeru Kamo, who bred immortal flower Kimjongilia, sent a congratulatory message to the 19th Kimjongilia Festival Organizing Committee on February 11 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 In the message he extended warm congratulations to the grand 19th Kimjongilia Festival in February 2015. 
					
					 He hoped that Kimjongilia would spread and bloom all over the world as immortal flower of the sun through extensive cultivation, developing of technology, scientific research and worldwide dissemination.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter from Military Attaches Corps Here
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter from Military Attaches Corps Here
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 Le Duy Long, military attache of the Vietnamese embassy, handed the floral basket and letter over to Korean People's Army General Hyon Yong Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, on Sunday.

articles.title: Reception Given for Employees of Wonsan Shoes Factory
articles.content:
Reception Given for Employees of Wonsan Shoes Factory
 Wonsan, February 15 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un who remodeled the Wonsan Shoes Factory into the palace of the workers gave a grand reception for the employees of the factory on Sunday.
					 An Jong Su, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, made a congratulatory speech.
					
					 He warmly congratulated the employees of the factory greeting the Day of the Shining Star under the particular care of the Marshal.
					
					 There are palaces where a tiny handful of the rich enjoy luxury but there is such workers' palace to be envied by everyone as the Wonsan Shoes Factory in the DPRK only, and there are also the words called a reception for workers only in Kim Il Sung's Korea, the DPRK led by the Marshal, he noted.
					
					 He extended the greatest glory and warmest thanks to the Marshal, reflecting the unanimous loyalty of all workers.
					
					 He called upon the employees of the factory to perform miracles and innovations in the production in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu, bearing in mind the pride that the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's love always reaches them and they live under the warm care of the Marshal at all times.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- There took place a reception at the DPRK embassy in Moscow on Feb. 12 to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Present there on invitation were Bushmin, vice-chairman of the Federation Council of Russia, Melinikov, first deputy speaker of the State Duma of Russia, and figures of the Federal Assembly, political parties, government, ministries, institutions and bodies.
					
					 On hand there were Kim Hyong Jun, DPRK ambassador to Russia, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the full-length picture of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They looked round the photos documenting the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il and boundless reverence of all people for him.
					
					 Bushmin in his speech lauded Kim Jong Il for carrying forward the cause of the President and performing great exploits in developing the friendly relations between Russia and the DPRK.
					
					 He said that Marshal Kim Jong Un is carrying forward the tradition of the Russia-DPRK friendship.
					
					 He referred to the recent brisk high-ranking visits and contacts between the two countries.
					
					 He stressed that Russia is convinced that the development of the bilateral relations not only brings practical interests to the peoples of the two countries but also serves as an important factor in ensuring peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia.

articles.title: Figure-Skating Festival Opens
articles.content:
Figure-Skating Festival Opens
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A figure-skating festival opened at the Ice Rink in Pyongyang Sunday to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, Ro Tu Chol, Ri Il Hwan, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Minister of Finance Ki Kwang Ho who doubles as chairman of the Figure-skating Association, Secretary General of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission Kim Il Guk, officials concerned and working people in Pyongyang, overseas Koreans, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, representatives of foreign missions and international bodies here and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Minister of Physical Culture and Sports Kim Yong Hun made an opening address.
					
					 Demonstration performance "Great Sun of Songun Korea" was given.
					
					 The numbers including "Fortune of Korea" and "Thinking of General" led the audience to feel deep reverence and yearnings for Kim Jong Il who made arduous journey of dedication with iron will and superhuman energy till the last moments of his life.
					
					 The audience warmly applauded the performers when they presented beautiful rhythmic and skillful movements.

articles.title: Synchronized Swimming Demonstration Given
articles.content:
Synchronized Swimming Demonstration Given
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A synchronized swimming demonstration "Boundless Is Our Yearning" took place in the swimming pool of the Changgwang Health Complex in Pyongyang on Sunday.
					 Among the spectators were Yang Hyong Sop, Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin, officials concerned, working people in Pyongyang, overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Invited there were representatives of foreign missions and international bodies here and their spouses and military attaches of foreign embassies here and their spouses.
					
					 The numbers included group synchronized swimming "Boundless Is Our Yearning", synchronized swimming duet "The Sound of a Horse's Hooves in Mt. Paektu" and synchronized swimming solo "I'll Be the Flower to Herald the Spring".  
					
					 Performers represented the profound reverence of all service personnel and people for Kim Jong Il through formation changes and rhythms.
					
					 Spectators were deeply impressed with group synchronized swimming "Party's Flag, Always Together with You", "Firm Resolve", "Victory Will Be Won Generation after Generation" and "Forward to the Final Victory" as they reflected the firm pledge of the whole army and people to eternally carry forward the ever-victorious tradition of Songun Korea by following the great party. 
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by spectators as it was successful and peculiar in formation art.

articles.title: Helicopters Carry Gifts to Pupils, Children on Islets in West Sea
articles.content:
Helicopters Carry Gifts to Pupils, Children on Islets in West Sea
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Pupils of primary schools and children of kindergartens and nurseries across the country received gifts associated with the benevolence of the Workers' Party of Korea, the mother party, on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Helicopters flew to islets in the West Sea of Korea on Feb. 15 with gifts for pupils and children residing there.
					
					 Under the care of the party helicopters flew to the islets as thick ice prevented sea voyage. 
					
					 Those islets included So, Sok, Jamae, Suun, Ka, Taehwa, Rap, Ae and Than.
					
					 Seeing their children excited with happiness, the residents on the islets renewed their pledges to remain loyal to Marshal Kim Jong Un who is protecting and blooming the future of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Chongryon Official
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Chongryon Official
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Ri Ryong Su, permanent advisor to the Nishi Tokyo Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), was interviewed by KCNA at the venue of the 19th Kimjongilia Exhibition on Sunday.
					 I cannot repress my emotion as the tender-hearted image of General Kim Jong Il comes across my mind when seeing immortal Kimjongilias in full bloom by the warm sincerity and ardent wishes of the people, he said.
					
					 I can never forget the day when I had the honor of being received by the General while visiting the motherland as a member of the delegation of chairmen of prefectural headquarters of Chongryon in Juche 91 (2002), he noted, and went on:
					
					 The General gave a grand reception and spent long time with us, giving precious teachings.
					
					 Seeing the General taking care of the sons and daughters in an alien land as their real parents, who think and love dearer their children far away than those nearby, would do, I took a firm pledge to keep to the path of patriotism all my life.
					
					 His love and trust are the lifeline which made me lead a worthy life as an official of Chongryon for nearly 50 years despite tempest.
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Jong Il is the great teacher and tender-hearted father of the Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The movement of Koreans in Japan is now put on a new higher stage as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, the peerlessly great man of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 We will usher in a new heyday of Chongryon in the glorious Kim Jong Un's era true to his leadership and thus greet the 60th anniversary of the formation of Chongryon with signal successes.

articles.title: US Cyber Strategy Assailed
articles.content:
US Cyber Strategy Assailed
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Afloat in the international arena is the widespread arguments against the Obama Administration's allegation that the DPRK is behind the hacking at the Sony Pictures Entertainment.
					 Commenting that this is an unbiased assessment of the international community, Minju Joson on Sunday says the DPRK has nothing to do with the hacking.
					
					 The Sony Pictures case is a product of the U.S. smear campaign against the DPRK, the paper stresses, and goes on:
					
					 This is neither speculation nor excuse for self-defence.
					
					 The DPRK has enough evidence to show that the U.S. is scheming to abuse the incident for the hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is pushing ahead with the work to launch a large-scale cyber attack on other countries prompted by its wild ambition for world domination. It is organizing "cyber tactical forces" and grouping the experts in cyber attack, defence and security.
					
					 The DPRK, Iran and other countries against the U.S. will be the main target of the U.S. new cyber strategy for holding supremacy in the cyber space. This public opinion of the world proves that the U.S. is the greatest cyber attacker and a state of cyber terror. 
					
					 The U.S. cyber strategy is a hideous crime of dangerous nature as it will result in the rivalry of cyber terror across the world and put the world in chaos and ruin.
					
					 The U.S. should know that cyber attack will not be good for itself.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts S. Korean Authorities' Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts S. Korean Authorities' Moves against DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- After the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea made public a special statement Wednesday warning the south Korean authorities that their persistent servitude to the U.S. will bring the most miserable end to them, the south Korean authorities talked rubbish.
					 They said the north's assertion was distorted and one-sided bluster, calling for instant stop to the north's armed threat.
					
					 They went so far as to bluff that they would resolutely counter the north's possible provocation.
					
					 Commenting on these remarks, Minju Joson Sunday says that this is a criminal act against the aspiration and desire of the Korean nation for the independent reunification by putting an end to outsiders' domination and interference. 
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The Democratic People's Republic of Korea advanced a proposal to remove the danger of war, ease the tension and create a peaceful climate on the Korean peninsula at the beginning of the new year and took practical steps on its own initiative.
					
					 Nevertheless, the north-south relations are getting worse and worse contrary to the Koreans' aspiration and desire and both the north and the south have not yet created elementary climate for holding a dialogue.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are to blame for making coarse remarks and running amuck with the confrontation moves and nuclear war drills against the north in league with the U.S. from the outset of the year.
					
					 Confrontation leads to war.
					
					 Firing of a bullet can plunge the Korean nation into the nuclear holocaust.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities ignite a war in collusion with the U.S., not only the U.S. mainland but other bases of the aggressors will be blown up by the DPRK's unimaginable and merciless strikes. It is the firm will of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities had better mind their behavior.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts S. Korean Channel A Broadcasting Service's Anti-DPRK Accusations
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts S. Korean Channel A Broadcasting Service's Anti-DPRK Accusations
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces let the pseudo Channel A Broadcasting Service make accusations against the DPRK only to be rebuffed by the public.
					 They let the Channel A denounce the DPRK's revelation of the U.S. imperialists' despicable germ and chemical warfare during the past Korean war as "sheer propaganda" and "one for fostering hostility toward the U.S." 
					
					 This is disgusting behavior of turning black into white and dirty rubbish conniving at the master.
					
					 The U.S. crimes of dropping germ bombs and spraying poisonous gases over the heads of the Korean nation were brought to light at the time when the war was at its height through the testimonies made by American pilots who had been captured and through the activities of the investigation teams of the International Association of Democratic Lawyers and the Women's International Democratic Federation and an international group made up of authoritative scientists.
					
					 It was mentioned in a confidential document that was declassified from the U.S. state archives in 2010 that the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff issued an order of large-scale actual test of specified pathogens in the Korean war to find out their effects. 
					
					 The U.S. atrocities are unpardonable crimes against humanity denounced and censured by not only the Koreans but the world progressives as they have become irrefutable fact.
					
					 Under this situation the puppet forces are working hard to cover up the truth, a clear proof that they are resorting to smear propaganda campaign.
					
					 One who is steeped in serving the master to the marrow of one's bones is bound to become shameless.
					
					 The puppet forces who stake their fate on servitude to the U.S. find themselves in a plight of sharing their lot with it.
					
					 They are obliged to do wrongdoings to serve the U.S.
					
					 It is for this reason that they are defending the germ warfare that inflicted huge damage and pain on the Korean nation, not content with working as a shock brigade executing the master's war moves.
					
					 In other words, they seek to shift the blame for escalating tension on the Korean peninsula on to the DPRK, quench anti-Americanism of south Koreans and prolong their dirty remaining days.
					
					 The south Korean conservative forces are matchless sycophants and traitors and confrontational maniacs who find their way out in working as a shock brigade in following the master's policy of stifling the DPRK and keeping south Korea as its colony and furthermore, realizing the world domination strategy.
					
					 No matter how desperately the puppet forces may try, they can never evade the poor fate of rushing headlong into the grave of doom along with their master falling into ruin. 
					
					 The unreasonable moves will only hasten destruction.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Stage Large-scale Mobile Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Stage Large-scale Mobile Drill
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The 20th Division of the south Korean puppet army on Feb. 14 staged again a large-scale mobile drill to mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 The area along the South Han River was covered with hundreds of tanks, armored cars and automatic artillery pieces involved in the drill.
					
					 The warmongers opened to public latest tank which was newly deployed last year.
					
					 They are acting a shock brigade for a war against the DPRK, blindly toeing the U.S. line.

articles.title: Fatal Accidents Unabated in S. Korea
articles.content:
Fatal Accidents Unabated in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- More than 100 vehicles collided on Great Yongjong Bridge in Inchon, south Korea on Feb. 11.
					 The accident left two dead and more than 60 heavily wounded.
					
					 On the same day part of ceiling at a construction site of a gymnasium in Seoul gave way, leaving seven workers under it buried in rubbles.
					
					 Accidents of various kinds have become unabated from the outset of the new year, causing great public fear. 
					
					 The south Korean newspaper Korea Economic Daily on Feb. 11 reported that traffic accidents in 2013 alone claimed 1,787,686 lives.
					
					 Serious accidents doing harm to the lives of people can never be checked as long as the architect of the ferry Sewol disaster keeps pursuing unpopular rule.

articles.title: Chairpersons of Chongryon Headquarters Meet
articles.content:
Chairpersons of Chongryon Headquarters Meet
 Tokyo, February 13 (KNS-KCNA) -- A meeting of the chairpersons of the headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) took place at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Feb. 10.
					 Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, in a report called upon the chairpersons to cherish heavy and honorable responsibility they have assumed before the era and discharge their duties by renewing ideological awareness and work style.
					
					 He also called upon them to turn out as one in this year's struggle to usher in a new heyday by putting the patriotic movement of Chongryon onto a higher stage as required by the glorious Kim Jong Un's era, true to his idea and intention.
					
					 Speakers vowed to more dynamically wage the movement for greeting the 60th anniversary of the formation of Chongryon with the signal achievements.

articles.title: Kimjongilia, DPRK Photo, Book and Handicraft Exhibition Opens in Russia
articles.content:
Kimjongilia, DPRK Photo, Book and Handicraft Exhibition Opens in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A Kimjongilia, DPRK photo, book and handicraft exhibition opened in Nakhodka, Russia on Feb. 9 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed in the front wall of the exhibition were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Immortal Kimjongilias were on display.
					
					 Also displayed were photos documenting the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il, works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, photos and books introducing Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with the wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Dutov, vice-major of Nakhodka city, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's life was characterized by his warm love for the country and the people.
					
					 He dedicated his all to the peaceful reunification of Korea and the peace and stability on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 He made great contribution to the development of friendly relations between Russia and the DPRK.
					
					 We will make all efforts to develop the relations with the DPRK.
					
					 Zelenov, first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Maritime Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, expressed his resolution to make positive contribution to further developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries this year marking the 70th anniversaries of the victory in the patriotic war of Russia and Korea's liberation.
					
					 The exhibition will last until on Feb. 20.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Personages of Myanmar, Ghana
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Personages of Myanmar, Ghana
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Personages of Myanmar and Ghana issued statements on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, said on Jan. 30:
					
					 Kim Jong Il foiled the enemies' offensive to stifle the DPRK and firmly defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country, turning it into an invincible political, ideological and military power that no enemy dares provoke. His distinguished feats will be kept forever in the minds of not only the Korean people but also progressives.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is successfully carrying forward the noble cause of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, has led the party, army and people of the DPRK to perform world-startling miracles and innovations in the building of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 We extend support and solidarity to the Korean people advancing under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The deputy general secretary of the National Democratic Congress of Ghana said on Feb. 10:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the greatest man who dedicated his all to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people.
					
					 His immortal feats will shine long with the DPRK winning victories day by day. 
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people will build a thriving socialist nation without fail as desired by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Peruvian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Peruvian Organization
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Generalissimo Kim Jong Il will always be alive in the hearts of the Korean people and progressives and his feats will be immortal with the century.
					 The Peruvian committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il said this in a statement on Feb. 10.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was born in Mt. Paektu, the holy mountain of Korea, on Feb. 16, 1942 and grew up while experiencing the eras of historic turn, including the struggle to liberate Korea from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and to build a new society, the great Fatherland Liberation War and the postwar reconstruction.
					
					 Under his outstanding leadership, the DPRK turned into an invincible power.
					
					 He published many famous works indicating the road to be followed by the Korean people and the world revolutionaries with his energetic ideological and theoretical activities and led the building of a thriving socialist nation, the struggle for Korea's reunification and the cause of global independence to a brilliant victory with his invincible Songun leadership.
					
					 We extend firm support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to build a thriving nation and reunify the country under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats for Korea's Reunification Praised by Personage of International Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats for Korea's Reunification Praised by Personage of International Body
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Guy Dupre, secretary general of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea, issued a statement on Feb. 5. 
					 The feats leader Kim Jong Il performed for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence will always be remembered by not only the Korean people but also the world progressives, he said, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il greatly contributed to the cause of putting an end to the division of the Korean nation and ensuring peace and stability on the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 He formulated the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo put forward by President Kim Il Sung as the three charters for national reunification. 
					
					 Thanks to his great bold decision, the north-south summits were held and the June 15 joint declaration, the milestone of Korea's reunification, and the October 4 declaration, the programme to implement it, were adopted. 
					
					 The independent and peaceful reunification of Korea is facing big difficulties owing to the moves of the U.S. imperialists and the present south Korean authorities. 
					
					 The anti-reunification forces' moves are bound to go bankrupt thanks to the struggle of the Korean nation to implement the north-south joint declarations to the letter. 
					
					 The Korean people will win a new victory and reunify the country without fail under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 They included a seminar and book and photo exhibition in India and Malaysia, lecture in Guinea and meeting in Brazil on Feb. 7 and 9.
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 The chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India said that there is no such great man as HE Kim Jong Il who performed the undying feats in accomplishing the cause of global independence with his outstanding idea and leadership ability which nobody can match.
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il comprehensively systematized the Juche idea and developed in depth it, thus providing the progressives with the powerful ideological and theoretical weapon for building an independent and peaceful new world. 
					
					 The director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea lauded Kim Jong Il for devoting his all to the country and people.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event in India.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreigners
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks were held in Russia, Ethiopia and Malaysia on Feb. 6 and 7 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 The chairman of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of A Just Russia said as follows:
					
					 Thanks to the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Il, the Korean people could achieve the great successes in building a thriving nation while foiling the U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The eye-opening news about the construction in the DPRK clearly proves that the revolutionary cause of Kim Jong Il is being carried forward.
					
					 Under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un the DPRK will continue to work signal miracles in building an economic power. 
					
					 The deputy director of a hospital of Ethiopia praised Kim Jong Il as the eternal leader of not only the Korean people but the world progressives. 
					
					 The section chief of the MCMC Company of Malaysia said Kim Jong Un is successfully carrying forward and accomplishing the Songun revolutionary cause that was pioneered and advanced by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Russian Newspapers Introduce Feats of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Russian Newspapers Introduce Feats of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The Russian newspapers carried special write-ups accompanied with the portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il and his photos and those of Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.
					 The Feb. 4th issue of Nakhodkinski Rabochi said as follows:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was born as a son of the guerrillas and grew up to be a great revolutionary while hardening his pledge to glorify Korea.
					
					 He defended socialism and turned Korea into a political and ideological power in which all people are united in single mind, a military power and a nuclear weapons state with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 Thanks to his tireless Songun revolutionary leadership, Korea's military muscle has been augmented in every way.
					
					 Changes taking place in Korea are a clear proof of the validity and vitality of the Songun politics.
					
					 The paper said that President Kim Il Sung provided the historical roots of the Songun politics.
					
					 Konkurent No. 3 in an article titled "Undying feats of guardian of peace" said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a reliable defender of peace and security of the Korean peninsula which was directly related to the destiny of humankind.
					
					 Under his leadership the Korean People's Army has grown to be invincible revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 He foiled the U.S. military provocation moves with his outstanding spirit and faith.
					
					 His feats for defending world peace are cherished in the hearts of mankind.
					
					 Rio Panorama on Feb. 4 noted that Kim Jong Il energetically worked day and night, regarding it as his biggest happiness and joy to devote himself to the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Bulgarian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Bulgarian Organization
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association issued its bulletin on Feb. 7 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The bulletin carried special write-ups illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 In an article titled "Life dedicated to people" the bulletin said under his leadership the Workers' Party of Korea developed into a mother party fully responsible for the destiny of the people.
					
					 He pursued the policy of love and trust and benevolent politics, the article said, and went on: 
					
					 He regarded Songun as the lifeline of the party and the revolution and solved all the issues on the principle of prioritizing the military affairs.
					
					 The biggest feat he performed was that he reliably defended socialism, future of mankind, by dint of Songun.
					
					 In another article titled "Fortitude and Will" the bulletin said that Kim Jong Il assumed the important post of supreme commander of the Korean People's Army on Dec. 24, 1991. It introduced his strong pluck, guts and commanding arts as a peerlessly brilliant Songun commander who led the stand-off with the U.S. to one victory after another.
					
					 An article titled "Popular policies in DPRK", citing facts, said that the Korean people are free from taxes and lead a stable life with all benefits provided by the state.

articles.title: British Figures Condemn US, S. Korea's Anti-DPRK Confrontational Racket
articles.content:
British Figures Condemn US, S. Korea's Anti-DPRK Confrontational Racket
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A demonstration denouncing the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces' anti-DPRK confrontational racket and human rights abuses took place outside the south Korean embassy in London on Feb. 5.
					 Attending the action were figures and members of the New Communist Party of Britain, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK.
					
					 The representative of the Korean Friendship Association UK said the present south Korean chief executive is reviving the "yusin" dictatorship of her father Park Chung-hee. He denounced fascist suppression as evidenced by the forcible disbandment of the Unified Progressive Party, legitimate political party, and the detaining of progressive activists including Hwang Son.
					
					 He strongly demanded the south Korean puppet authorities set free all the political prisoners, abolish the "Security Law" and immediately stop all human rights abuses at once.
					
					 He also disclosed the illegality of the U.S. forces' presence in south Korea and the atrocities committed by those forces in south Korea.
					
					 The demonstrators chanted slogans and handed out to passers-by copies of literatures disclosing the south Korean puppet forces' human rights abuses and anti-DPRK racket.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Mexican Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Mexican Paper
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The Mexican paper Unidad Nacional on Jan. 30 carried the New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The paper carried a photo of Kim Jong Un making the address.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita el campo de construccion de la avenida de cientificos Mirae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita el campo de construccion de la avenida de cientificos Mirae
Pyongyang, 15 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la construccion de la avenida de cientificos Mirae, luego de contemplar desde el avion de uso particular el campo de construccion.
					Mirando el panorama del campo desde el avion, el Mariscal dijo que lucen muy bien los objetos arquitectonicos ubicados segun el proyecto de formacion de la avenida firmado por el partido.
					
					Gracias a los esfuerzos abnegados de los constructores militares, se levantaron como crecen hongos las armaduras de viviendas y edificios publicos a ser terminados en la primera etapa, apunto.
					
					Anadio muy satisfecho que este campo de construccion hace imaginar los terrenos de construccion de las decadas de 1970 y 1980 y se crean aqui el espiritu de Pyongyang y la velocidad de Pyongyang de hoy.
					
					Indico el objetivo y tamano de la segunda etapa, enfatizando la importancia de terminarla bien para que luzcan mejor las construcciones de la primera etapa.
					
					Viendo a bordo de avion el aspecto majestuoso de la ciudad de Pyongyang que se cambia cada dia, tuve la seguridad de que a la velocidad actual de construccion, podemos remozar en un futuro cercano esta capital de la revolucion como ciudad de talla mundial, que envidiaria todo el mundo, segun los legados del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Luego, acudio al campo de construccion para dirigir la obra.
					
					Me puse complacido al ver desde avion el panorama del campo de construccion y resulta mas espectacular todo lo que veo en el terreno, dijo sonriente.
					
					Luego de escuchar explicaciones ante el plano de la avenida, recorrio la vivienda no. 1 del tercer piso del edificio no. 77, la estacion de bombeo de aguas geotermicas y otros puntos de la construccion haciendo conocimiento detallado de la construccion de primera etapa.
					
					Continuo que los constructores militares levantan los objetos de construccion de primera etapa a las alturas del nuevo siglo.
					
					Para poner de relieve el aspecto de la nueva avenida, ellos removieron el dique original y construyeron el otro nuevo a lo largo de la ribera del rio Taedong y construyen bien el interior de las viviendas, evaluo.
					
					Refirio que la avenida de cientificos Mirae debe ser testigo de la politica del partido de dar importancia a las ciencias y a los talentosos y enfatizo que los funcionarios de las unidades correspondientes y los constructores militares deben terminar la obra a ser legada de siglo en siglo con la posicion de crear la mejor civilizacion y la maxima velocidad.
					
					Instruyo que todas las construcciones deben tener sus particularidades con que puedan simbolizar la avenida de cientificos.
					
					Enseno que deben amueblar las viviendas en el maximo nivel y acondicionar la barberia, peluqueria, tintoreria, bano publico, sastreria, zapateria y otras instalaciones de servicios publicos.
					
					Agrego que hay que acondicionar bien la red de servicios medicos y comerciales y las instalaciones culturales, tales como la farmacia, restaurante, tienda, biblioteca, etc.
					
					Refirio que se debe acelerar la obra conforme a la demanda del diseno y del metodo de construccion, por una parte, y por la otra, impulsar simultaneamente el ordenamiento de las riberas y la creacion de zonas verdes.
					
					Encomendo a los oficiales que desarrollen la emulacion socialista al anteponer las labores politicas a fin de movilizar al maximo las fuerzas espirituales de los constructores y presten profunda atencion a las labores de intendencia y atender bien con afecto paternal las condiciones de vida de ellos.
					
					Dijo que la construccion de primera etapa debe ser terminada sin falta hasta el Dia del Sol de este ano (15 de abril) y la segunda, hasta el aniversario 70 de la fundacion del PTC (10 de octubre).
					
					Prosiguio que para ese fin, se debe movilizar mas fuerzas constructoras del ejercito popular y todo el partido, todo el Estado y toda la sociedad deben apoyar activamente la construccion.
					
					Subrayo que el campo de construccion de la avenida es un lugar que demuestra cuan justa es la politica del partido sobre la construccion y como son la pauta de civilizacion del pueblo coreano y las fuerzas espirituales del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					Continuo que en los ultimos tiempos, bajo la direccion del partido, se crean grandes cambios tambien en otros campos de construccion socialista.
					
					Viendo desde avion y en el terreno a los constructores militares que trabajan intensamente a pesar del frio invernal, redoble la conviccion de que gracias a esos soldados tan indoblegables y fieles, se cumplira sin falta el proyecto del partido de construir una patria prospera, asevero y les envio un saludo combativo del Comandante Supremo.
					
					Destaco que los constructores militares deben ampliar los exitos alcanzados en todo el campo de construccion para cumplir como lo planificado las tareas de edificacion de cada edificio y por cada etapa y dia, demostrando asi una vez mas a todo el mundo la verdad de que la decision de Corea es precisamente un hecho consumado.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto central por dia de natalicio de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto central por dia de natalicio de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 15 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar hoy en el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang el acto central por el 73o aniversario de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					Estuvieron presentes Choe Ryong Hae, Hwang Pyong So y otros cuadros responsables del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas, el poder, las entidades de masas, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los benemeritos, los familiares de los martires revolucionarios, los trabajadores capitalino, los compatriotas y el representante del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					Fueron invitados los delegados diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los agregados militares, acreditados en Corea.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico y secretario, del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					El informante dijo que el 16 de febrero es el jubiloso dia nacional que dio a la nacion coreana la suerte de tener generacion tras generacion a los lideres ilustres y deviene la maxima fiesta comun revolucionaria de la humanidad que abrio el radiante porvenir de la causa de independencia de las masas populares, y prosiguio:
					
					El Dirigente nacido en el Paektu, monte sagrado de la revolucion y crecido en medio de las llamaradas de la gran guerra antijaponesa y antiyanqui, abrigo el gran proposito de glorificar de generacion en generacion a Corea y durante largo tiempo de mas de medio siglo desde cuando emprendia el camino de la revolucion dirigio a la victoria el PTC y a los militares y civiles coreanos.
					
					Kim Jong Il creo la historia de victoria de la causa revolucionaria del Juche con la ferrea conviccion y el inquebrantable espiritu de ataque, logro milagros y cambios en todas las esferas de la politica y asuntos militares, la economia y la cultura y realizo la magna causa  que ostenta a todo el mundo la dignidad y el aspecto majestuoso de la patria.
					
					Formulo la idea revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung como el kimilsungismo y lo glorifico como idea directriz de la epoca de independencia, sistematizo la idea del Songun y presento la linea revolucionaria del Songun y la teoria de la politica de Songun.
					
					El hizo que la RPDC demuestre su poderio como unica potencia ideo-politica en este mundo, preparo la invencible unidad monolitica en que todo el ejercito y el pueblo comparten la misma idea, voluntad y sentimiento con su lider al practicar la politica abarcadora y de beneficios populares con su extraordinaria capacidad politica y fortalecio notablemente el sujeto de la revolucion coreana.
					
					En los dias mas dificiles, levanto en alto la bandera del Songun y convirtio la RPDC en la potencia militar y pais poseedor de armas nucleares a que ningun enemigo poderoso se atreva a atacar, lo cual constituye un milagro nunca visto en la historia de la humanidad y las hazanas a elogiarse para siempre.
					
					Abrio el atajo de la construccion de potencia economica y preparo valiosos bienes y recursos para la prosperidad eterna de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					Con el ardiente amor a la nacion, dirigio a todos los connacionales a la lucha por la reunificacion independiente de la patria y la gran unidad nacional, allano la era de reunificacion del 15 de junio basada en el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", intensifico la posicion internacional de la RPDC con su diestra tactica diplomatica y  abnegadas actividades exteriores, asi que contribuyo grandemente a preservar la paz y la estabilidad del mundo.
					
					Con la elevada responsabilidad sobre el futuro de la revolucion, resolvio con brillantez el problema de sucesion del liderazgo y logro inmensas hazanas que aseguran para siempre el porvenir de la patria y la revolucion.
					
					Gracias a contar con el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, quien hereda tal como es la idea, la direccion y la noble virtud de los grandes lideres, continua el gran avance de la revolucion coreana y el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos con la fe en la victoria avanzan a pasos firmes hacia la cima de un Estado prospero.
					
					Al finalizar, el informante exhorto a todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo a alcanzar grandes victorias en la ofensiva general por la defensa socialista y la construccion de un Estado prospero en acato al mensaje del ano nuevo del Mariscal, la resolucion del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y las consignas conjuntas del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central, del PTC, para celebrar con los grandes acontecimiento revolucionarios el 70o aniversario de la liberacion del pais y de la fundacion del PTC.
					
					Este dia, se efectuaron los actos similares en todas las provincias, ciudades, distritos y los complejos.
